Name: SlipDrive
About the game: A throwback to the classic arcade style games of the 90’s. While testing an experimental slipstream drive, a pilot for the UEA experiences a malfunction that transport his ship to uncharted space. Now you will need to make your way through these odd structures and build up enough power to open a Slipstream window back to Earth. Navigate your craft through various gauntlets, then put your skills to the test in the endless challenge mode. Break your personal best times and see how you measure up to other players! Features – Immersive Experience – 5 Unique Worlds – 4K Support – VR Integration – Unique Mouse Controls – Amazing Soundtrack – Global Leaderboards
